name: Samurai Hachi
description:
Live the adventure of Kazuki Matsumoto, a young samurai that lives only for the revenge of his village, that was attacked by the japanese youkai Raijin, demon/god of Thunder and War. During your journey you will faced with 8 challenges (in this demo we only have 2 developed) that are japaneses youkais that want to face you. By your side, you will handle the demonic katana Shitsukoi, a relic of your village that gains power according to the emotions of the user, and the legendary bow Raijin Sanda, stolen from the demon that attacked Kazuki's village. Live for the revenge against those who killed your family and friends.

This game is a demo, still on development by game students from Brazil.

It was made with Pygame 1.9.6, a game library for Python.
